content.query:
SELECT command
FROM sys.dm_pdw_exec_requests
ORDER BY submit_time DESC;


CREATE TABLE #temp ( [model] [varbinary](max) ) WITH ( DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN, HEAP )
COPY INTO #temp ( model ) FROM 'https://pomboadlsgen22.dfs.core.windows.net/blobtest/outputcsharp1.tmp' WITH ( FILE_TYPE = 'CSV' )
insert into democsharpcheck ([ID],[name],[model]) select 'pomboModel','modelCheck', [model] from #temp
select * from democsharpcheck

-- Create a stored procedure for storing the scoring script.
drop PROCEDURE storedProcFinalDemocshard;
CREATE PROCEDURE storedProcFinalDemocshard
AS
BEGIN
-- Select input scoring data and assign aliases.
WITH InputData AS
(
    SELECT
        CAST([fareAmount] AS [real]) AS [fareAmount],
        CAST([paymentType] AS [bigint]) AS [paymentType],
        CAST([passengerCount] AS [bigint]) AS [passengerCount],
        CAST([tripDistance] AS [real]) AS [tripDistance],
        CAST([tripDistance] AS [bigint]) AS [tripTimeSecs],
        CAST([tpepPickupDateTime] AS [varchar]) AS [pickupTimeBin]
    FROM [dbo].[NYCdata]
)
-- Using T-SQL Predict command to score machine learning models. 
SELECT *
FROM PREDICT (MODEL = (SELECT [model] FROM democsharpcheck WHERE [ID] = 'pombosynapse1-tablenyc-20221124065701-Best:1'),
              DATA = InputData,
              RUNTIME = ONNX) WITH ([label] [bigint])
END
GO

-- Execute the above stored procedure.
EXEC storedProcFinalDemocshard
